title: An Alignment-Free Method for Detection of Missing Regions for Phylogenetic Analysis
abstract: Phylogenetic tree estimation using conventional approaches usually requires pairwise or multiple sequence alignment. However, sequence alignment has difficulties related to scalability and accuracy in case of long sequences such as …

title: Permutation invariant multi-output Gaussian Processes for drug combination prediction in cancer
details: L Rønneberg, V Lalchand, PDW Kirk - arXiv preprint arXiv:2407.00175, 2024
abstract: Dose-response prediction in cancer is an active application field in machine learning. Using large libraries of\textit {in-vitro} drug sensitivity screens, the goal is to develop accurate predictive models that can be used to guide experimental design …
